snippet: After an anemic first half for the Boston Celtics, guard Isaiah Thomas knew things had to change....
lead_paragraph: After an anemic first half for the Boston Celtics, guard Isaiah Thomas knew things had to change.

headline.main: Thomas Scores Career-High 44, Celtics Beat Grizzlies in OT
